53 template<typename intsmall, typename intmedium, typename intlarge>class Ema {
54 public:
55  Ema(intmedium start, intsmall alpha){ average_ = start; this->alpha = alpha; }
56  static intmedium small_max(){ return 1<<(8*sizeof(intsmall)); }
57  intmedium calc(intmedium in){
58  intlarge tmp0;
59  tmp0 = (intlarge)in * (alpha) + (intlarge)average_ * (small_max() - alpha);
60  average_ = (intmedium)(((intlarge)tmp0 + (intlarge)small_max()) >> (sizeof(intsmall)*8));
61  return average_;
62  }
63  intmedium avg() const { return average_; }
64  intmedium average() const { return average_; }
65  void set(intmedium v){ average_ = v; }
66 private:
67  intmedium average_;
68  intsmall alpha;
69 };

101 class Ema_float {
102 public:
103  Ema_float(float start, float alpha){ this->alpha = alpha; average_ = start; }
104  static float small_max(){ return 1.0; }
105  float calc(float in){
106  float tmp;
107  average_ = in * (alpha) + average_ * (1.0 - alpha);
108  return average_;
109  }
110  float avg() const { return average_; }
111  float average() const { return average_; }
112  void set(float v){ average_ = v; }
113 private:
114  float average_;
115  float alpha;
116 };
